metas.name: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
metas.description: It's a fun, action-packed animated adventure based on a beloved video game, similar to Sonic and Kung Fu Panda's energy.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: A heartwarming and hilarious family comedy with a charming protagonist, much like the feel-good nature of Sing and Encanto.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
metas.description: Visually stunning animation and an exciting superhero adventure with great humor, appealing to fans of Zootopia and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: An epic animated adventure with a heartwarming story about friendship and overcoming differences, reminiscent of Brave and Tangled.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: A vibrant animated musical adventure with a strong female lead and beautiful animation, similar to Encanto and Coco.

metas.name: Toy Story
metas.description: A groundbreaking animated film with humor, heart, and adventure that has enduring appeal, similar to the classic feel of Shrek and Ratatouille.

metas.name: Klaus
metas.description: A beautifully animated origin story of Santa Claus, filled with charm and humor, with a fantastical element like Kiki's Delivery Service and Ponyo.

metas.name: Luca
metas.description: A delightful animated film about friendship and summer adventures with a touch of magic, offering a similar lighthearted tone to Ponyo and My Neighbor Totoro.

metas.name: Mitchells vs. the Machines
metas.description: A hilarious and action-packed animated comedy about a quirky family saving the world, with a creative visual style like Zootopia.

metas.name: Despicable Me
metas.description: A fun animated comedy with lovable characters and a lot of laughs, fitting in with the humor of Shrek and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Tinkerbell and the Legend of the NeverBeast
metas.description: An adventure with magical creatures and a heartwarming story, appealing to the fantasy and adventure elements of Tangled and Brave.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: A witty and inventive stop-motion animated adventure about chickens trying to escape a farm, with a similar comedic spirit to Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: The Princess and the Frog
metas.description: A vibrant animated musical adventure with a strong princess story and jazz-infused music, aligning with Encanto and Coco.

metas.name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
metas.description: A stylish and quirky stop-motion animated film with a clever story and memorable characters, similar to the unique charm of Shrek and Ratatouille.

metas.name: Shaun the Sheep Movie
metas.description: A hilarious and charming stop-motion animated adventure with no dialogue, relying on visual gags, much like Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: A Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
metas.description: Another delightful stop-motion adventure from the Shaun the Sheep team, perfect for fans of comedic animation and lighthearted stories.

metas.name: Raya and the Last Dragon
metas.description: An epic animated adventure with a strong female protagonist, beautiful animation, and themes of unity, fitting with Zootopia and Brave.

metas.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
metas.description: A wacky and imaginative animated comedy about an inventor whose food machine goes haywire, offering plenty of laughs like Ratatouille and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Lilo & Stitch
metas.description: A heartwarming animated story about family, friendship, and embracing differences, with humor and adventure, similar to Zootopia and Encanto.

metas.name: The Emperor's New Groove
metas.description: A hilariously funny animated comedy with a fast-paced plot and witty dialogue, perfect for fans of Shrek and Kung Fu Panda.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. the Machines
metas.description: A visually unique and hilarious animated adventure about a family on a road trip who have to save the world from robots, similar to the creative humor of The Bad Guys and Zootopia.

metas.name: Over the Hedge
metas.description: A fun animated comedy about a group of forest animals who venture into the suburbs, with clever humor and adventure, fitting with Zootopia and Kung Fu Panda.

metas.name: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
metas.description: A charming and funny stop-motion animated mystery adventure, perfect for those who enjoyed the previous Wallace & Gromit installment and Shrek's fantasy elements.

metas.name: The LEGO Movie
metas.description: A fast-paced, incredibly funny, and visually inventive animated adventure that kids and adults will love, similar to the humor of The Bad Guys and the action of Sonic.

metas.name: Aladdin
metas.description: A classic animated musical adventure with a charismatic lead, humor, and magical elements, aligning with the magic of Tangled and Encanto.

metas.name: Mulan
metas.description: An empowering animated adventure with action, music, and a strong heroine, resonating with the themes of Brave and Tangled.

metas.name: Megamind
metas.description: A smart and funny animated superhero comedy with a unique twist on villainy, appealing to fans of Zootopia and Kung Fu Panda.

metas.name: Anastasia
metas.description: A beautiful animated musical adventure with a touch of mystery and romance, offering a similar magical feel to Tangled and Kiki's Delivery Service.

metas.name: Arthur Christmas
metas.description: A hilarious and heartwarming animated Christmas adventure with a clever premise and engaging characters, similar in tone to Sing and Encanto.

metas.name: Ernest & Celestine
metas.description: A charming and beautifully animated French film about an unlikely friendship, with a gentle fantasy element like Ponyo and My Neighbor Totoro.

metas.name: The Illusionist
metas.description: A gentle and poignant animated film with a touch of melancholy and wonder, similar in artistic style to Kiki's Delivery Service and Spirited Away.

metas.name: The Gruffalo
metas.description: A delightful short animated film based on a popular children's book, with a simple adventure and memorable characters, perfect for younger viewers.

metas.name: The Snowman
metas.description: A timeless and heartwarming animated short with a beautiful musical score, evoking a sense of wonder and magic similar to Studio Ghibli films.

metas.name: Wolfwalkers
metas.description: A visually stunning animated fantasy adventure with a strong emphasis on nature and friendship, akin to the imaginative worlds of Studio Ghibli and Brave.

metas.name: My Life as a Zucchini
metas.description: A unique stop-motion animated film that tackles sensitive themes with warmth and humor, offering a different but equally touching experience.

metas.name: A Cat in Paris
metas.description: A stylish and exciting animated adventure with a jazzy soundtrack and a clever plot, offering a fun caper similar to The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Song of the Sea
metas.description: A visually breathtaking animated fantasy based on Irish folklore, with themes of family and magic, reminiscent of Studio Ghibli's enchanting storytelling.

metas.name: The Red Turtle
metas.description: A beautiful and contemplative animated film with no dialogue, focusing on the cycle of life and nature, with a magical realism feel similar to Ponyo.

metas.name: Ernest & Celestine: A Trip to Gibberitia
metas.description: A delightful sequel to the heartwarming Ernest & Celestine, continuing the charming animation and gentle storytelling.

metas.name: The Little Prince
metas.description: A visually imaginative animated film that blends a modern story with the classic tale, offering a thoughtful and magical adventure.
